nodes.text: An Ahch-Tonian grub was a type of creature native the the remote planet of Ahch-To. The Wookiee Chewbacca once attempted to use these grubs as bait for fishing on the planet, only to find that there were no fish to catch because of it being the winter season. Porgs enjoyed these grubs as food, though Chewbacca hated the grubs, as did Wookiees in general.
